channel.title: Anyone got coords for the rc altars if not coords list
channel.description:
Well I am currently adding Runecrafting to my sever but I can't find the coords of the altar to make them so anyone got a list of coords to it????
Very gratefull.

item.title: Anyone got coords for the rc altars if not coords list

item.description:

Here’s altar coords.

cosmic altar = 2162 4833

mind altar = 2796 4818
air altar = 2845 4832
water altar = 2713 4836
earth altar = 2660 4839
fire altar = 2584 4836
bod yaltar = 2527 4833
